ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Medley Overhaul
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is true.  It doesn t break mez.  Makes it VERY useful, although you ll have to repeatedly defend yourself to less-knowledgable party members.  It
ygData.messageBody:
Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> Binding doesn't break mez???? really???? Damn, wish I had known that. It
> would have saved me a lot of deaths in Sol A if I could have slowed those
> gobbies down since they were all beating on me anyhow every time the
> enchanter got a resist. I would never have guessed that Largo's didn't
> break mez.
>
> Kit

This is true. It doesn't break mez. Makes it VERY useful, although you'll have to
repeatedly defend yourself to less-knowledgable party members. It interferes with
Togor's though. Don't tick off the Shamans.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 47.6 songs., Innoruuk (I really want that 48th song...)
